reviews.review: Ok, ever heard of Counter Strike, TF2, And WWII? Well I atleast hope you know about the WWII 1942 Times in Germany well this games relates to that time in war, it's a two team war game USA Army, and Wehrmacht, Wehrmacht are German Soldiers in WWII Times. Its TF2 Because how the gameplay and team war based of the game is, its like Counter Strike, because sorta same thing it's like CSS But DoD Aka Day of Defeat. DoD:S and CSS, I hope you know what im trying to say they have "Source" at the end of the names or the game and its like that hard to explain how its like CSS. I reccomend this game for ages 12+ on my opinion from how it is, yes I am 12 at the time 2014 but, does that really matter unless you are the parent reading this and does not like your young daughter or son playing games that have, Blood, Violence, and WWII 1942, because in real life 1942 WWII was bad times. I hope this review helped you parents, ladies and gentleman to know more about the game before buying it.

10/10 A multiplayer WW2 themed FPS game. Different classes and two different teams. Goal of the game is to play as a team and capture objectives (or destroy them) or play non-official gamemodes like Gun-Game, etc. Would recommend you try.

Been playing since it was new. Loved it ever since. One of my very first steam games. I have many more hrs. on a friends account, before i had a steam of my own.

Timeless classic 10/10

I have been playing this game for many years and 1000+ hours, though this account only has a few logged. I also occasionally have a server up called the Blunt Club. I was never fond of the official-looking maps but orange maps and sniper maps were my stomping ground for a good 2 year period. The WAR clan hated me because I would head-shot Cobra and all of his army wannabes and the AOD admins loved having someone providing a challenge in both clans' sniper servers. Anyways, with this history in mind I must say that this game is incredibly fun. Like most games, there are things about it that irk me such as the wonky running system, but I'm more of a face value overall kind of reviewer. In that vein, I give this game:         _->      8/10     <-_

One word.... Outstanding!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Played one night so far and I am hooked.

Einleitung: Ich habe mir das Spiel vor gut drei Jahren gekauft und es auch regelmäßig gespielt. Mich hat das Szenario interessiert.

Setting/Story: Day of Defeat: Source spielt gegen Ende vom Zweiten Weltkrieg, als die Amerikaner auf der Normandie gelandet sind und Stück für Stück Frankreich befreien. Also um 1944 rum. Es gibt jedoch auch einige italienische Karten wie Anzio.

Gameplay: Es ist ein sehr stark "vercasualisiertes" Counter-Strike: Source. Der Movementspeed ist ziemlich hoch, man kann sprinten und man braucht nich unbedingt besondere Taktiken. Der Recoil is immens hoch und beinahe unkontrollierbar, deswegen muss man sich daran gewöhnen um in Firefights zu gewinnen. Es gibt verschiedene Klassen zur Auswahl, alles haben eine besondere "Fähigkeit" mit der rechten Maustaste. 

Maps: Die Maps sind alle abwechslungsreich, bieten mehrere Wege um an das Objective ranzukommen oder Gegner zu flankieren. Meine Matches verliefen immer so, dass ein Teil von unserem Team mir durch so einen Weg gefolgt ist und wir so gewonne haben. 

Fazit: Day of Defeat: Source ist ein gutes Spiel, jedoch fehlt dem die Aufmerksamkeit, die es bräuchte. Es gibt zu wenige Server, die wirklich "spielbar" sind. Aber wenn man den passenden Server findet kann der Spaß schon losgehen. Die 10€ sind definitiv gut ausgegeben.
trop bon jeu
Amazing game! Realistic WWII style. Love it!
Nice game if you like 2WW! 10/10

Fast paced action of counter strike mixed with the teamwork and objective play of games like insurgency...put that with brilliant map design, balanced classes and weapons, and great looking source engine graphics and entertaining ragdoll physics. Every map I've played, both official and community, have been absolutely fun to play. The weapons are both historically accurate and great to use. The classes are some of the most balanced I've ever played. But what I love about this game is the feel and vibe the environments give off. And the emphasis on teamwork makes the game what it is. If you like the second world war, and you're into games, get this one. Hell, get it either way.

Ahhhh, the WWII fps how I do love you so . When I found out that this game existed one year ago it looked amazing. This game is good and it certainly does feel like a Valve multiplayer game. This is probably one of the most tactical games I hve ever played. You and your MUST work together in order to win. I like this idea (unless your team is filled with idiots) because it requires teamwork in order to succeed. You can't go lone wolf in this like most games. Now is it good for new players? No mainly because this game needs experience to succeed and unlike Counter Strike, no bots to practice on. All in all, I like this game I give it an 8.5/10.

Valve's... classic shooter...? Does it count? Anyways, it's revamped and in one of the oldest builds of Source!

[b] Pros: [/b]
- Quick kill time makes combat concise yet exciting
- Everything has a counter, which gives everyone a specific role
- The guns are very satisfying to shoot
- Cheaper than CS:S! For some reason! I'm not sure!

[b] Cons: [/b]
- Dying community. The game has like, maybe 300 players on a day at it's peak
- Maps are pretty much garbage. The community kinda sucks at making maps too
- It's age (and Valve's laziness) really show

[b] Overall: 7.2/10 [/b]
Day of Defeat: Source is definitely past it's prime. It's pretty much forgotten by it's maker, and it's community is basically entirely comprised of people that have been playing since release and refuse to buy anything else. But behind that tough nut is a game that definitely has potential. It's difficult, and finding the right part of the community can be difficult too, but there must be some reason those 300 people have been playing for years!
très bon jeu

Day of Defeat: Source – сиквел к моду Half-Life, Day of Defeat. Работает на движке Half-Life 2, Source, и, подобно Counter Strike: Source, придерживается оригинальной формулы, внося несколько незначительных доработок в геймплей.Похвалы удостоились графика и атмосферный, стратегический геймплей, аудиоработа и общее представление.
А все остальное не имеет значения...
